---
name: "Feature: Chapter/Club Management"
about: "Add support for organizing activities into chapters or clubs."
title: "[Feature] Chapter/Club Management"
labels: [enhancement]
assignees: []
---

**Problem:**
All activities are currently in a flat list, with no grouping or organization.

**Proposed Solution:**
Allow activities to be grouped into chapters or clubs, with their own members and events.

**Benefits:**
- Better organization
- Enables club-level management and reporting

**Additional context:**
See Evolvve-Student-Chapter-App for reference.
